dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3484995T] Use of a State Farm Trademark
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 14, 2007 5:32 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3484995T] Use of a State Farm Trademark ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Use of a State Farm Trademark Added by system at Wednesday, Mar 14 2007 09:36 am X-MailFrom: home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Mar 14 09:35:47 2007 Received: (qmail 5055 invoked by alias); 14 Mar 2007 14:35:47 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 5052 invoked from network); 14 Mar 2007 14:35:47 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 14 Mar 2007 14:35:47 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 14 Mar 2007 09:35:46 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 14 Mar 2007 09:35:47 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HRUZu-0001lZ-PU for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 14 Mar 2007 09:35:46 -0500 Received: from netc.statefarm.com ([12.34.246.30]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HRUZh-000OIR-Ul for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 14 Mar 2007 09:35:33 -0500 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Return-Receipt-To: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C76646.00AEA7EC" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Subject: Use of a State Farm Trademark Date: Wed, 14 Mar 2007 07:35:24 -0700 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Use of a State Farm Trademark Thread-Index: AcdmRgCHsb+6/lblSmu+Mk+t3iGTHg== From: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" To: Cc: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Mar 2007 14:35:24.0880 (UTC) FILETIME=[00B2A500:01C76646] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY One State Farm Plaza Bloomington, Illinois 61710-0001 Theplanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com RE: Use of a State Farm Trademark Dear Sir/Madam: This is to notify you that Anant Reddy mailto:A_chittamuru@hotmail.comis infringing our trademark "State Farm" within the metatags of the website "www.autoinsurancesupport.com/terms.html/." Our research reflects that Theplanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is the ISP for this website. The metatags of the website uses our U.S. federally registered trademark "State Farm." This trademark was registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office on June 11, 1996. The owner is State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company. The mark has been in use in interstate commerce since 1930. This is also the year of our first use. This mark is used for insurance services, see Registration No. 1,979,585. This individual is not authorized to use our trademark "State Farm." Further, cease and desist emails were sent to the email address of the registrant contact on 11/07/06, 12/22/06, and 01/30/07; however, no responses have been received. As of this date, our trademark is still being used in the metatags of this website. Pursuant to clauses in your Acceptable Usage Policy under Intellectual Property Infringement Policy: Users may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others or violates any trade secret right of any other person.... If any Customer or any Third Party User, including those that are customers of our Customers, repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy, any copyright law or any other intellectual property right, The Planet reserves the right to (i) suspend permanently or terminate The Planet Services of such Customer and/or (ii) suspend permanently or terminate the access to The Planet Services, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure by such Third Party User. Please initiate an investigation and have our trademark removed from the metatags of this site, or have the site terminated. I would appreciate hearing from you as to what action will be taken by the close of business on April 3, 2007. Sincerely, Debra J. Monke, ACP Intellectual Property Administrator home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com DJM/rje MIME element (text/html) Use of a State Farm Trademark

STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY
